DOC.brief_summary: This surveillance's objectives are: 1. Unknown adverse reactions 2. Incidences of adverse drug reaction 3. Factors considered to have effect to safety and effectiveness
DOC.brief_title: Post-marketing Surveillance of DC Bead in Patients With Hepatocellular Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Patients with Hepatocellular carcinoma Exclusion criteria:
